person_say: I didn't complete my study plan on time and now I'm feeling anxious. How can I adjust?
animal_say: Do you want to focus on managing your anxiety first, or would you like help organizing your study plan? I can connect you with the right buddy!

person_say: I think managing my anxiety first would be helpful. I feel so overwhelmed by everything.
animal_say: There's a gentle bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and relaxation. Would you like to meet him to help ease your anxiety?

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bruno! I think he can really help ease my anxiety.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno is just a paw-sitive spirit away! Let's get you connected with him!
